name: Los Fantasticos Viajes de Ruka
description:
"Los Fantasticos Viajes de Ruka" - First Project ever made

Dive into the worlf of Ruka, a kid with a magic conch that lets him dive underwater and speak to animals. 

Based on the awarded local tv animated series with the same name.

------------------

In charge of:

  • All Game and Level Design aspects 
  • Balancing and Testing
  • UX Research and Implementation
  • Project Manager
  • Recruiting and Building of Developement team

-------------------

Postmortem: Incredible Learning Experience. Not only for having so many responsibilities in my first real project, but also for the tools and knowledge adquired in UX and Testing, having to learn how to create a sign and color language for children 4-6 without the need for words, even though we did use some for kids who did know some words.

-------------------------

The best part of this, was creating a game that could teach kids about the Chilean Ocean an its beautiful creatures in a fun and gamified way. Expanding the media outreach of the local tv serie.
